00055 class Application : public Object {
00056     friend class ApplicationSelf;
00057 public:
00058 
00069     const String location() {
00070         return _location;
00071     }
00072 
00073     static ApplicationSelf * self_app;
00074 
00100     static void init(int argc, char * argv[], char * apple[], AppType type,
00101             String name);
00102 
00103 protected:
00104     String _location;
00105 
00106 private:
00107     Application();
00108     virtual ~Application();
00109 
00110 
00111 };

00120 class ApplicationSelf : public Application {
00121     friend class Application;
00122 public:
00123     const String appName() {
00124         return _appName;
00125     }
00126 
00133     AppType appType();
00134 
00135     void fail(const String reason);
00136     void fail(const String reason, const String file, unsigned int line);
00137 
00138 
00139     virtual const File& bundle() = 0;
00140     virtual const File& resourceDir() = 0;
00141     virtual const File resource(String rsc) = 0;
00142     virtual const File& libraryDir() = 0;
00143     virtual const File& pluginDir() = 0;
00144     virtual const File& plugindisabledDir() = 0;
00145 
00146     virtual const File& systemLibraryDir() = 0;
00147     virtual const File& systemSettings() = 0;
00148     virtual const File& systemSettingsDir() = 0;
00149     virtual const File& systemPluginDir() = 0;
00150     virtual const File& systemPluginDisabledDir() = 0;
00151     virtual const File& systemResourceDir() = 0;
00152     virtual const File systemResource(String rsc) = 0;
00153 
00154     virtual const File& userHome() = 0;
00155 
00156     virtual const File& userLibraryDir() = 0;
00157     virtual const File& userSettings() = 0;
00158     virtual const File& userSettingsDir() = 0;
00159     virtual const File& userPluginDir() = 0;
00160     virtual const File& userPluginDisabledDir() = 0;
00161     virtual const File& userResourceDir() = 0;
00162     virtual const File userResource(String rsc) = 0;
00163 
00164     virtual const File& prefix() = 0;
00165 
00166 protected:
00167     ApplicationSelf() {
00168         _preconstruct();
00169     }
00170     virtual ~ApplicationSelf();
00171 
00172     void _fail(const String appName, const String reason);
00173     void _fail(const String appName, const String reason,
00174             const String file, unsigned int line);
00175

00180
